description: Will Singapore face a recession too? ST Explains looks at the impact of the US interest rate hike. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: ST Explains: What higher rates mean for inflation, the economy and loans
title_page: ST Explains: What higher rates mean for inflation, the economy and loans | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - Investors and consumers have had to grapple with the three Rs - rising prices, rising interest rates and the dreaded recession - for the past few weeks.
The United States central bank has hiked rates three times in the past four months to tame inflation, leaving benchmark rates between 1.5 per cent and 1.75 per cent.
